ygData.subject: OFF TOPIC (partly Enchanters vs Bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay... next time I post something I should wait until I m awake. My response to the post about enchanters vs bards said nothing to answer the question the
ygData.messageBody:
Okay... next time I post something I should wait until I'm awake. My response to the post about "enchanters vs bards" said nothing to answer the question the person asked. I apologise for wasting everyone's time. I guess I should really read my posts before I make them. Sorry guys!

Brangwen Incantare
TIRED L25 Lady Wood Elf Bard who is so sleepy she can hardly type this
======================================================


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
